option.name: src_repo
option.description: This is the repo that conataiins the source code for this wordpress site.

command.script: cd / sudo rm -rf @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp sudo mkdir @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp is created. cd @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo downloading the project. sudo git clone --single-branch --branch @option.deployment_branch@ https://@option.src_repo@ .

if [ @option.deployment_branch@ = "master" ] then sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content echo the destination is created. cd /@option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp mysql -u root -p'@option.mysql_root_pass@' @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@ < themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/db_backup/db_backup.sql mysql -u root -p'@option.mysql_root_pass@' @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@ -e "UPDATE wp_options SET option_value = 'https://@option.domain_name@/@option.project_path@' WHERE option_name = 'siteurl' OR option_name = 'home'"; sudo rm Jenkinsfile sudo rm README.md sudo rm -rf themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/* sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content/ else sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content/* sudo rm -rf /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content echo the destination is cleared. sudo mkdir -p /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content echo the destination is created. cd /@option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp mysql -u root -p'@option.mysql_root_pass@' @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@ < themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/db_backup/db_backup.sql mysql -u root -p'@option.mysql_root_pass@' @option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@ -e "UPDATE wp_options SET option_value = 'https://@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/@option.project_path@' WHERE option_name = 'siteurl' OR option_name = 'home'"; sudo rm Jenkinsfile sudo rm README.md sudo rm -rf themes/@option.theme_name@/resources/* sudo cp -a . /var/www/@option.deployment_branch@.@option.domain_name@/public_html/@option.project_path@wp-content/ fi
echo the artifacts are copied to the destination. sudo rm -rf /@option.src_project_name@_@option.deployment_branch@_temp echo the temp direcotry is removed.
